description: This file is a Flutter widget that displays a list of user accounts, including features like loading indicator, pull-to-refresh, and account details display.

classes.name: AccountsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of accounts with pull-to-refresh functionality.

classes.name: _AccountsScreenState
classes.description: State class for AccountsScreen that manages fetching and displaying account data.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state and triggers fetching of accounts.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the accounts list including loading indicator and pull-to-refresh.
